name: Piggy Detected!
description:
Piggy Detected! is a game designed from the African Swine Fever issue.
Chinese New Year is coming, wish everyone can tell each other the importance of this issue to avoid ASF!

[How to Play]
1. When the baggage passes the scanner, slide left and right to adjust the pellucidity to find the baggage carrying the prohibited meat.
2. If you find suspicious baggage, tap the scan button immediately.
3. If you can correctly scan out the prohibited meat, you will get the bonus to purchase auxiliary function!
4. If the illegal baggage is not caught, the epidemic index will rise and it will be too bad...
